price: 87. Mais il n’en est rien, par miséricorde de ton Seigneur, car Ses faveurs envers toi sont immenses.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan min rabbika inna faḍlahu kāna ʿalayka kabīran
